landing.title: Health Worker Booking System
landing.subtitle: Easily schedule appointments with qualified health professionals

easyBooking.title: Easy Booking
easyBooking.description: Simple and intuitive appointment scheduling with real-time availability

qualifiedProfessionals.title: Qualified Professionals
qualifiedProfessionals.description: Choose from a network of certified health workers and specialists

secureSystem.title: Secure System
secureSystem.description: Your personal information and health data are always protected

login.title: Welcome Back
login.subtitle: Sign in to your therapist account

register.title: Therapist Registration
register.loginLink: Already have an account? Login here

confirmation.title: Booking Confirmed!
confirmation.subtitle: Your appointment has been successfully booked. A confirmation email has been sent to {email}.

calendar.title: Add to Calendar
calendar.description: Save this appointment to your calendar so you don't forget!

help.ios: This will download an .ics file that you can open with the Calendar app
help.android: This will open your device's calendar app to add the event
help.mac: This will open the appointment directly in your Calendar app
help.other: This will download an .ics file compatible with most calendar applications

errors.noSlots: No available slots for this date
errors.missingInfo: Please fill in all required fields

placeholders.bio: Tell us about your background and approach...

errors.passwordTooShort: Password must be at least 8 characters long
errors.generic: An error occurred. Please try again.

availability.title: Availability
availability.subtitle: Manage your available times
availability.weeklyAvailabilityDescription: Set your recurring weekly schedule. Enable days and set time ranges when you're available.
availability.blockedTimeSlotsDescription: Block specific dates and times when you're not available for appointments.
availability.noBlockedSlots: No blocked slots. Add one above to block specific dates and times.
availability.failedToLoad: Failed to load availability. Please try again.
availability.failedToSave: Failed to save availability. Please try again.
availability.networkError: Network error: Unable to connect to server. Please check your connection and try again.
availability.confirmLeave: You have unsaved changes. Are you sure you want to leave?

dashboard.manageAppointments: Manage your appointments, availability, and profile settings
dashboard.setWeeklySchedule: Set your weekly recurring schedule and block specific dates when you're not available
dashboard.seeScheduledAppointments: See all your scheduled and upcoming appointments
dashboard.viewPatientBookings: View patient bookings and manage your schedule
dashboard.shareLinksDescription: Share these links with patients to view your profile and book appointments:
dashboard.shareTip: üí° Tip: Share these links via email, social media, or add them to your website to let patients learn about you and book appointments.

appointments.viewManageAppointments: View and manage all your scheduled appointments

availability.setWeeklySchedule: Set your weekly recurring schedule and block specific dates when you're not available
